title: The Week In Sports: 76ers On A Rebuilding Spree
teaser: NPR's Rachel Martin speaks with Slate's Mike Pesca to find out what's up with the Philly 76ers trading away all their best players, and we'll hear the news around the track. The Daytona 500 is today.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
